name: node-pdftk
description: A wrapper for pdftk with streams and promises.

scripts.pretest: pdftk test/files/form.pdf fill_form test/files/form.fdf output test/files/filledform.temp.pdf && pdftk test/files/form.pdf fill_form test/files/form.fdf output test/files/filledformflat.temp.pdf flatten && pdftk test/files/form.pdf stamp test/files/logo.pdf output test/files/stamp.temp.pdf && pdftk A=test/files/document1.pdf B=test/files/document2.pdf cat A B output test/files/documentcatwithdate.temp.pdf keep_final_id && pdftk test/files/documentcatwithdate.temp.pdf update_info_utf8 test/files/documentcat.info output test/files/documentcat.temp.pdf && pdftk test/files/form.pdf generate_fdf output test/files/form.temp.fdf && pdftk test/files/document1.pdf background test/files/logo-multiple-pages.pdf output test/files/background.temp.pdf && pdftk test/files/document1.pdf multibackground test/files/logo-multiple-pages.pdf output test/files/multiBackground.temp.pdf

author: Justin Williamson <jjwilly1984@gmail.com>
